page.title: 05My house
page.content:
I live in a terraced house on an estate called Clos Orange. We are buying it with a States Loan (special mortgage). It was built about 5 years ago. My house has a rendered finish, but there are others that are pink brick.
I have 3 bedrooms, one for each of my children and one larger for my husband and I, a bathroom, a kitchen, lounge/diner, downstairs toilet and garage. Our kitchen is quite large so for every day use we eat at a breakfast bar with stools. There is a garden front and back, the larger being at the back where I grow a few vegetables. In the front garden we have a small lawn and enough space to park 4 cars. It is a very nice quiet estate and we are very pleased with our house.
